QuestData.Title: Glimmering Locket
QuestData.Description:
<A glint of metal catches your eye among the gently bobbing flotsam. Digging into the tangled seaweed, you discover a locket of simple, yet sturdy design.
Opening the locket reveals a hand-drawn picture of a woman with fiery red bangs.
Her arm is around a woman with short-cropped auburn hair, and the two are proudly displaying warm smiles for the artist.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Glimmering Locket to Stabby Jane.
